attributes.action: Withdraw our troops from Iraq and Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Armed Forces are being killed in Iraq and Afganistan for no reason which will benefit this country. They are only engaged in these countries because the Government wants them there for reasons they have failed to explain to the people of the United Kingdom. We should bring them home and let these countries sort out their own problems. We are not the worlds policemen and should not be interfering with the domestic politics of other countries.
